name: RestApi
description: The AWS::ApiGateway::RestApi resource contains a collection of Amazon API Gateway (API Gateway) resources and methods that can be invoked through HTTPS endpoints.

properties.name: Body
properties.description: A Swagger specification that defines a set of RESTful APIs in JSON or YAML format.

properties.name: BodyS3Location
properties.description: The Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) location that points to a Swagger file, which defines a set of RESTful APIs in JSON or YAML format.

attributes.name: RootResourceId
attributes.description: The root resource ID for a RestApi resource, such as a0bc123d4e.
